title: INC-20260118-VENDOR-0042 — CLEAR sanctions + no breach → RELEASE
content: Vendor payment TXN-000142 to Deutsche Logistics GmbH for EUR 85,000 submitted at 09:15 UTC on 2026-01-18. Established beneficiary with 24-month transaction history. Sanctions screening returned CLEAR with 0% match confidence - no hits against OFAC SDN, EU consolidated list, or UN sanctions. Liquidity gate assessment: starting balance EUR 1,800,030, projected balance after payment EUR 1,715,030, minimum buffer threshold EUR 1,500,000. No buffer breach - headroom of EUR 215,030 (14.3% above minimum). Payment within standard amount threshold (< EUR 250,000), processed by Payments Operator without additional approval per policy_approval_matrix.md Section 3.1. Released via SEPA at 09:18 UTC, well before 14:00 UTC cutoff. Standard audit bundle attached with tool run IDs. Case closed - routine processing.
